refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the function used to compute the datatip string.

listitem.para: A handle on a datatip or its parent.
A variable that contains a function (type==11 or type==13) or the name of this function. This function syntax must be str=fun(h) where h is the handle of the datatip.
This function must return a string or a vector of strings in str.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Set the function used to format the text to be displayed at the datatip point. If the handle of the parent of the datatip is given as first argument, then all the datatips which don't have a display function will have same one.
